scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/pomodoro.png dist/pomodoro.png && cp src/background-script.js dist/background-script.js && parcel src/pomodoro.html
scripts.build: parcel build src/pomodoro.html && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/pomodoro.png dist/pomodoro.png && cp src/background-script.js dist/background-script.js
